name: Without a mark
description:
Without mark is a memory game where you get packets that you need to store to your warehouse. The warehouse has a limited amount of space and every shelf can hold a limited amount of weight.  
CONTROLS

- E / Right click - When there is a truck on stop you can send it back by pressing E or right click. There is no penalty to sending the truck back.
- Left Click - You can left click an object to interact with it.

Gameplay

You will start with 100$ and 1 box per delivery. But after each day the delivery will rise.  
You will pay fees every other day. The fee will start at 100$ and will rise each day.  
If you give a wrong packet to the buyer you will lose 100$  
The game ends when you will run out of money
